name: Paint Your World: A M00fins Experience
name_original: Paint Your World: A M00fins Experience
description:
Paint Your World : A M00fins Experience


Paint Your World : A M00fins Experience is an online experience driven game where you are the artist! Search hundreds of different areas for inspiration for your next painting, set up your canvas and paint away! Perfect for beginners and advanced artists alike.

Real World Inspiration


Search Forests, Winter Wonderlands, Space, Deserts, Neighborhoods, and more to find inspiration for your next painting. Speak with others in the community and share concepts and ideas, as well as artwork.

Painting


A Variety of different painting mediums, as well as access to different brushes and tools are available. Blend colors, Mix colors, and create your one of a kind piece! Turn on some relaxing music while you paint, or work in silence. Paint inside of your custom studio, or set up your easel anywhere and draw your inspiration directly from nature. Listen to the sounds of nature as you design your vision for what's in front of you. Once your painting is completed, share it with the community, gift it to a friend, or hang it in your studio. Be sure to create your own special signature and sign your paintings!

Who Is M00fins?


Behind this project, we are working with an online painter named m00fins. He began his journey painting after dealing with years of mental health struggles, and now spends his time sharing the power of art with folks who are just starting out, or others who have been at it for quite some time. His ability to share his stories, as well as the good he's brought to his community and the community as a whole was our inspiration to work with him in creating this one of a kind experience. With his help, we hope to fine tune this experience to bring you the most accurate painting simulator possible. You may even get a visit from him while your painting!
